div.h3: From the Stage to the Screen
div.p: Hello! I'm Rolland Aditya. My journey is a unique blend of communication, technology, and discipline. I'm fluently bilingual in Indonesian and English, a skill I honed as the Vice President of my English Club. I have extensive experience commanding the stage as a Master of Ceremonies (MC) and public speaker for various events.

My entrepreneurial spirit sparked in high school, where I ran successful ventures reselling goods. This drive, combined with my passion for technology, led me to front-end development. Off-screen, I'm a dedicated fitness enthusiast and martial artist, having competed in Taekwondo, Karate, and Boxing. The discipline and resilience from the dojo translate directly into my work, fostering strong leadership and teamwork abilities in any environment.
Engaging and professional hosting for your events. I bring energy and clarity to any stage, ensuring your message is delivered effectively.
Creating modern, responsive, and user-friendly websites. From concept to deployment, I build digital platforms that make an impact.
With a background in martial arts and event management, I bring focus, resilience, and strong leadership to every project.

div.p: Led the development of the official website for a major university event I also helped organize and MC'd for.
